extendedMaterials.title: Extended Materials
extendedMaterials.description: Take a look at the websites below before you jump into your assignment. This might help you grasp the concept and learn better.

moreExercises.title: More Exercises
moreExercises.description: Improve your skills with more practice

reasons.UNCLEAR: The chatbot's response were unclear or confusing
reasons.UNFRIENDLY: The chatbot's tone was not friendly or encouraging
reasons.NO_RESPONSE: The chatbot took too long to respond or didn't respond at all
